verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'You shall be <S%H6918>holy,<s%> for I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

<S%H376>'Every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of you shall <S%H3372>reverence<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> and his father, and you shall <S%H1>keep<s%> My <S%H8104>sabbaths;<s%> I am the <S%H7676>Lord<s%> your <S%H3068>God.<s%>
'Do not <S%H6437>turn<s%> to <S%H457>idols<s%> or <S%H6213>make<s%> for yourselves <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H430>gods;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

'Now <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you shall <S%H2076>offer<s%> it so that you may be <S%H7522>accepted.<s%>

'It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H2077>offer<s%> [it], and the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day;<s%> but what <S%H3498>remains<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
'So <S%H518>if<s%> it is <S%H398>eaten<s%> at <S%H398>all<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> it is an <S%H6292>offense;<s%> it will not be <S%H7521>accepted.<s%>

'And everyone who <S%H398>eats<s%> it will <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> for he has <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>thing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people.<s%>

'Now when you <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall not <S%H7114>reap<s%> to the very <S%H6285>corners<s%> of your <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H3950>gather<s%> the <S%H3951>gleanings<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>

<S%H3808>'Nor<s%> shall you <S%H5953>glean<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H3950>gather<s%> the <S%H6528>fallen<s%> <S%H6528>fruit<s%> of your <S%H3754>vineyard;<s%> you shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them for the <S%H6041>needy<s%> and for the <S%H1616>stranger.<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H1589>steal,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8266>deal<s%> <S%H8266>falsely,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8266>lie<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5997>another.<s%>
'And you shall not <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> by My <S%H8034>name,<s%> so as to <S%H2455>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of your <S%H430>God;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H6231>oppress<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1497>rob<s%> [him]. The <S%H6468>wages<s%> of a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>man<s%> are not to <S%H3885>remain<s%> with you all <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H7043>curse<s%> a <S%H2795>deaf<s%> <S%H2795>man,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>place<s%> a <S%H4383>stumbling<s%> <S%H4383>block<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5787>blind,<s%> but you shall <S%H3372>revere<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5766>injustice<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> you shall not be <S%H5375>partial<s%> <S%H6440><s%> to the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1921>defer<s%> <S%H6440><s%> to the <S%H1419>great,<s%> but you are to <S%H8199>judge<s%> your <S%H5997>neighbor<s%> <S%H6664>fairly.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H1980>go<s%> about as a <S%H7400>slanderer<s%> among your <S%H9415>people,<s%> and you are not to <S%H5975>act<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1818>life<s%> of your <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H8130>hate<s%> your <S%H251>fellow<s%> <S%H251>countryman<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> you may <S%H3198>surely<s%> <S%H3198>reprove<s%> your <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> but shall not <S%H5375>incur<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of him.

'You shall not <S%H5358>take<s%> <S%H5358>vengeance,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5201>bear<s%> any <S%H5201>grudge<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> but you shall <S%H157>love<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> as yourself; I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'You are to <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes.<s%> You shall not <S%H7250>breed<s%> <S%H7250>together<s%> <S%H3610>two<s%> <S%H3610>kinds<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle;<s%> you shall not <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H7704>field<s%> with <S%H3610>two<s%> <S%H3610>kinds<s%> of seed, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5927>wear<s%> a <S%H899>garment<s%> upon you of <S%H3610>two<s%> <S%H3610>kinds<s%> of <S%H8162>material<s%> <S%H8162>mixed<s%> <S%H8162>together.<s%>

'Now <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7902>carnally<s%> <S%H2233><s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> is a <S%H8198>slave<s%> <S%H9176>acquired<s%> for [another] <S%H376>man,<s%> but who has in <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6299>way<s%> been <S%H6299>redeemed,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> her <S%H2668>freedom,<s%> there shall be <S%H1244>punishment;<s%> they shall not, [however,] be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she was not <S%H2666>free.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering.<s%>

'The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall also <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him with the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed,<s%> and the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed<s%> shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

'And <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> kinds of <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> then you shall <S%H6188>count<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit<s%> as <S%H6190>forbidden.<s%> <S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> it shall be <S%H6189>forbidden<s%> to you; [it] shall not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
'But in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy,<s%> an offering of <S%H1974>praise<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> you are to <S%H398>eat<s%> of its <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> that its <S%H8393>yield<s%> may <S%H8393>increase<s%> for you; I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> [anything] with the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5172>practice<s%> <S%H5172>divination<s%> or <S%H6049>soothsaying.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H5362>round<s%> off the side-growth of your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7843>harm<s%> the <S%H6285>edges<s%> of your <S%H2206>beard.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H5414>make<s%> any <S%H8296>cuts<s%> in your <S%H1320>body<s%> for the <S%H5315>dead,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> any <S%H3793>tattoo<s%> <S%H7085><s%> <S%H3793>marks<s%> on yourselves: I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'Do not <S%H2455>profane<s%> your <S%H1323>daughter<s%> by <S%H2181>making<s%> her a <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> so that the <S%H776>land<s%> may not <S%H2181>fall<s%> to <S%H2181>harlotry,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4390>become<s%> <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2154>lewdness.<s%>
'You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> and <S%H3372>revere<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
'Do not <S%H6437>turn<s%> to <S%H178>mediums<s%> or <S%H3049>spiritists;<s%> do not <S%H1245>seek<s%> them out to be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> by them. I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

'You shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H7872>grayheaded,<s%> and <S%H1921>honor<s%> the <S%H6440>aged,<s%> <S%H2205><s%> and you shall <S%H3372>revere<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H3588>'When<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>resides<s%> with you in your <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall not <S%H3238>do<s%> him <S%H3238>wrong.<s%>

'The <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who <S%H1481>resides<s%> with you shall be to you as the <S%H249>native<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> you, and you shall <S%H157>love<s%> him as yourself; for you were <S%H1616>aliens<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
'You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5766>wrong<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> in <S%H4060>measurement<s%> of <S%H4948>weight,<s%> or <S%H4884>capacity.<s%>

'You shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H3976>balances,<s%> <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H68>weights,<s%> a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>ephah,<s%> and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H1969>hin:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
'You shall thus <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>' "
